channel.title: Should the Gateway or Workstation be setup with more computer resources, and at what ration for each item?
channel.description: Say I have 16GB RAM and an Intel i7. Should I apply more resources, such as RAM (base memory), processors, and video memory, to the Gateway or Workstation? Which one requires more resources, and could the type of usage change that answer? Which setting is best for normal browsing and which is best for intensive operations, for example?

item.title: Should the Gateway or Workstation be setup with more computer resources, and at what ration for each item?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Related documentation:

Whonix – 28 Dec 20

Advice for Systems with Low RAM

How to use Whonix ™ with 4 GB RAM or less RAM.

Whonix – 16 Jan 21

Post-installation Security Advice

This page provides security advice, steps that can be applied after installation of Whonix ™ for better security.

Whonix – 16 Dec 20

Tuning - Whonix

Making Whonix ™ Faster. Tuning Whonix ™.

torbirdy:

Should I apply more resources, such as RAM (base memory), processors, and video memory, to the Gateway or Workstation?

If you don’t have an issue here, it doesn’t need changes.

torbirdy:

Which one requires more resources, and could the type of usage change that answer?

Answered in first link.

torbirdy:

Which setting is best for normal browsing and which is best for intensive operations, for example?

Unspecific to Whonix. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle applies.

Read full topic
item.source: Should the Gateway or Workstation be setup with more computer resources, and at what ration for each item?
